thread.title: BRIEF-Bank Of Hawaii Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.28

title: BRIEF-Bank Of Hawaii Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.28
text: April 23, 2018 / 10:57 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Bank Of Hawaii Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $1.28 Reuters Staff April 23 (Reuters) - Bank of Hawaii Corp: * ORATION FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.28 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.23 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZES INCREASED DIVIDEND OF $0.60 PER SHARE * NET INTEREST INCOME, ON A TAXABLE-EQUIVALENT BASIS, FOR Q1 2018 WAS $120.3 MILLION, UP $7.4 MILLION * “GENERAL ECONOMIC CONDITIONS IN HAWAII REMAINED POSITIVE DURING” Q1 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
